styles.name: Classic Clean
styles.description: Minimalist layout with clean lines, subtle shadows, and easy-to-read stats. Timeless and versatile.

styles.name: Monochrome
styles.description: High-contrast, black-and-white or single-tone design — great for a sleek, powerful feel.

styles.name: Vibrant Energy
styles.description: Vibrant colors, big typography, and dynamic shapes — perfect for showing off intense workouts.

styles.name: Retro Vibes
styles.description: Inspired by 80s–90s design — bold blocks, pixel patterns, or retro typography.

styles.name: Photo Focus
styles.description: Puts user photos front and center with minimal overlays — perfect for scenic shots or selfies.

styles.name: Minimal Outline
styles.description: A modern and elegant design style that emphasizes clarity and subtlety.
